alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL FRANKLIN, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Hilliard, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, penny size hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Bexley, Groveport, Plain City, Ohio State University, Whitehall, Grandview Heights, Obetz, Valleyview, Marble Cliff, Port Columbus Airport, Amity, Clintonville, Lincoln Village and New Rome. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 88 and 106. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 102 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
